question.confirm_delete_diagram: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the {{diagramType}} diagram "{{diagramName}}"?
question.confirm_delete_element: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this element?
question.confirm_go_to_diagram: Are you sure you want to open the linked diagram? Not saved changes to the current diagram will be lost.
question.confirm_not_saved_changed: Are you sure you want to continue? Not saved changes will be lost.
question.confirm_not_saved_changed_current_projec: Are you sure you want to continue? Not saved changes of the current project will be lost.
question.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to exit? Not saved changes of the current project will be lost.
